User Story Description: Collect ANPR & ATCC dataset from Kaggle; validate images & videos
Perform initial preprocessing: resizing; denoising; normalization
Conduct EDA on traffic patterns; number plate structure; vehicle classes
Set up YOLO + OCR environment; verify GPU compatibility
Outlier removal & scaling for numeric features used in analytics pipelines
Data encoding and plate-level metadata preparation (categorical handling)
Train detection & classification models (YOLOv8) and evaluate
Identify best-performing model(s) using evaluation metrics (mAP; F1)
Hyperparameter tuning and retraining on best model
Create prototype Streamlit webpage to display detections; plates; counts
Develop interface for Streamlit or hosting
Integrate OCR output into UI (show recognized plate text with confidence)
Develop conversational/alert feature (optional) or integrate basic alerts
Integrate ANPR & ATCC modules into single Streamlit app and test end-to-end
Final integration; performance tuning; and inference-time optimizations
Prepare final documentation; demo script; and project PPT for submission by Dec 8
